summary:
IN A NUTSHELL
I am a lawyer qualified in Germany who enjoys working in an international environment and making an impact by giving legal advice and support to businesses and colleagues so that they can accomplish their goals. | I enjoy deep-diving when it comes to legal questions and sparring with colleagues to exchange ideas and to create mutual learning opportunities | Growth mindset, interested in continuously expanding knowledge (hard skills and soft skills).

GLOBAL CITIZEN
Born and raised in Germany, lived in London, Linköping, Beijing and Shanghai, currently based in Tokyo | I am passionate about Asia - travelling, learning about the cultural characteristics and learning Mandarin Chinese and Japanese.

LANGUAGES SKILLS
Native: German | Fluent: English, Mandarin Chinese and Dutch | Studying: Japanese 

EDUCATION
Lawyer qualified in Germany, registered with the Bar Association Frankfurt am Main since 2013.
Goethe-Universität Frankfurt am Main: Specialised in public international law.
Master of Comparative Law (China University of Political Science and Law, Beijing).

HOBBIES
In my free time I love watching Chinese movies/TV-series and practicing Yoga.

awards:
[{'title': 'Postgraduate Scholarship "Language and Professional Training in the People's Republic of China"', 'description': 'The program "Language and Professional Training in the People's Republic of China" aims at qualifying excelling German graduates as experts and managers for China. 
Up to ten graduates from certain study fields are selected every year. The program includes language courses in Mandarin at Beijing Foreign Studies University, an internship at a company or an international organization in China as well as visits to German and Chinese companies.
